f(x) = 2x + 3

( ) 3

[ ] 4

Which one was wrong?

dogs

Question 2

What is the output of the following line of code?

import babypandas as bpd
bpd.DataFrame().assign(x=[1, 2, 3]).get('x').iloc[2]
for _ in range(50):
    print('hello')

does this question make sense?

here’s the answer to my question
